text: Suggestions: = Practice the activity #1 some more (blank copy in BS) * Make sure you understand: ® The difference between an experiment and a quasi-experiment ® The difference between a sample and the population of interest * Look at your Quiz #1 and practice any areas of information where you got a question wrong = Chapter 1 study guide * Flash cards = Concept maps or outlines = Visit the LAs!!! (they can help you with one or all of the above!)
